Subject: External Storage Settings
Description: Customer is IGA Airport Our customer's request is as follows; We need to update the External Storage Setting field on EPP. We need to mount it by running “mount -t nfs -o ‘vers=3,nolock,rsize=524288,wsize=524288’ a1ecsnfsvh01p.igairport.aero:/ecs_nfsshare/EPP/ /path” on the server but we could not do it because it is an Appliance. Screenshot attached.
Solution_Comment__c: Partner requested that case be closed as the customer resolved the issue.
